response.headline: Shinshu Furusato no Mieru Oka viewpoint in Suwa City, Japan - scenic overlook with mountain views
response.summary: Shinshu Furusato no Mieru Oka (信州ふるさとの見える丘) is a scenic viewpoint located in Suwa City at Tateishikoen. The location was established on March 31st, Heisei 28 (2016) and offers panoramic views of the surrounding landscape and mountains.

extracted_text: 信州ふるさとの見える丘
諏訪市 立石公園ビューポイント
image_details.key_interest: Japanese scenic viewpoint location with official designation information
